name: Anchor points to be marked by surveyor and confirmed with DELTA
Excavation & Preparation of Anchor Wall face / batter
As per drawings & site inspection from DELTA
Hole to be drilled to specification
On Record as per Drilling and Installation docket
Grout pump to be actuated by a piston of screw pump
Water & Cement grout mix as per design
Batch by dry weight measure water by calibrated flow meter, continuous agitating after mixing use recirculation system inject within 30 mins of batching
Field testing of grout for Compressive Strength, Per batch, 3 tests
Installation & Grouting of Rock Bolt/Anchors/Soil Nails
Place anchor in prepared clean hole, fill hole from the bottom using grout tube allow grout to flow until pure grout comes out top of hole
TDS, PDS, batch number, Mill certificates, Test Certificates
Drilling and installation docket for Anchors done on a daily basis
Stressing records captured per AGT records
